titlestmt.titleproper: Wagner Free Institute of Science collection of museum furniture specifications and drawings from the Smithsonian Institution 1947-1947
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Wagner Free Institute of Science collection of museum furniture specifications and drawings from the Smithsonian Institution

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of specifications and blueprints for museum cases from the Smithsonian Institution's United State National Museum. These specifications were requested by Robert Chambers, the Director of the Wagner Free Institute of Science. Included are two cover letters to Chambers from L.L. Oliver, Superintendent of Buildings and Labor at the Smithsonian.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
